remoteId.description: The remote id of the payees.

sourceAmountFrom.description: The source amount from range filter. Filters for sourceAmount >= sourceAmountFrom

sourceAmountTo.description: The source amount to range filter. Filters for sourceAmount ⇐ sourceAmountTo

paymentAmountFrom.description: The payment amount from range filter. Filters for paymentAmount >= paymentAmountFrom

paymentAmountTo.description: The payment amount to range filter. Filters for paymentAmount ⇐ paymentAmountTo

submittedDateFrom.description: The submitted date from range filter. Format is yyyy-MM-dd.

submittedDateTo.description: The submitted date to range filter. Format is yyyy-MM-dd.

pageSize.description: The number of results to return in a page

sort.description:
List of sort fields (e.g. ?sort=submittedDateTime:asc,status:asc). Default is sort by remoteId

The supported sort fields are: sourceAmount, sourceCurrency, paymentAmount, paymentCurrency, routingNumber, accountNumber, remoteId, submittedDateTime and status

sensitive.description:
Optional. If omitted or set to false, any Personal Identifiable Information (PII) values are returned masked.
If set to true, and you have permission, the PII values will be returned as their original unmasked values.

$ul: **content**
**links**
**page**
**numberOfElements**
**page**
**pageSize**
**totalElements**
**totalPages**
**summary**
**confirmedPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have been confirmed.
**failedPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have failed or been returned.
**incompletePayments**: The count of payments within the payout which are incomplete.
**instructedDateTime**: The date/time at which the payout was instructed.
**payoutMemo**: The memo attached to the payout.
**payoutStatus**: The current status of the payout. One of the following values: ACCEPTED, REJECTED, SUBMITTED, QUOTED, INSTRUCTED, COMPLETED, INCOMPLETE, CONFIRMED, WITHDRAWN
**releasedPayments**: The count of payments within the payout which have been released.
**submittedDateTime**: The date/time at which the payout was submitted.
**totalPayments**: The count of payments within the payout.
**withdrawnDateTime**: The date/time at which the payout was withdrawn.
**correlationId**: a unique identifier to track a request or related sequence of requests
**errors**: one or more errors
**httpStatusCode**: this will mirror the Status-Code part of the Status-Line http response header and is included for extra clarity
